title: Congaree National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Congaree National Park strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park and about upcoming projects and programs by providing press releases to local and regional news providers and by posting current news releases on this website. If you are a member of the media, please contact the Public Information Officer for additional information about Congaree.
